qDefinition:
IF(MINSTRING (TransmissionClassificationCode)='NO_CASES','No cases'
,IF(MINSTRING(TransmissionClassificationCode)='SPORADIC','Sporadic cases'
,IF(MINSTRING(TransmissionClassificationCode)='CLUSTERS','Clusters of cases'
,IF(MINSTRING(TransmissionClassificationCode)='COMMUNITY','Community transmission'
,IF(MINSTRING(TransmissionClassificationCode)='UNK','Unknown'
)))))
